snippet: Columbia earned the first automatic berth into the N.C.A.A. baseball tournament by sweeping Dartmouth, 6-2 and 4-1, in the Ivy League championship series.
abstract: Columbia earns the first automatic berth into the NCAA baseball tournament by sweeping Dartmouth, 6-2 and 4-1, in the Ivy League championship series.
lead_paragraph: Columbia earned the first automatic berth into the N.C.A.A. baseball tournament by sweeping Dartmouth, 6-2 and 4-1, in the Ivy League championship series.
